name: Dealermade
body:
### JavaScript Media Layer Integration

```html
<script src="http://dealermade.co/assets/media-layer/v1/dm.js" 
data-dm-dealership-id="[DEALERMADE DEALERSHIP ID]" 
data-dm-vehicle-vin="[VEHICLE VIN GOES HERE]"
data-dm-element-ids-to-hide="[ELEMENT ID #1]|[ELEMENT ID #2]|[...]" async></script>
```
Required attributes of script tag:
* **src**: currently _must_ point to: http://dealermade.co/assets/media-layer/v1/dm.js   
* **data-dm-dealership-id**: Unique Dealership ID.
* **data-dm-vehicle-vin**: Full vin number of vehicle to display pictures for.
* **data-dm-element-ids-to-hide**: One or many element ids separated by a "|" pipe character that will be hidden when the media layer and the corresponding vehicle pictures are loaded.

### Support - Having trouble with our media layer? 
Please contact: jared@dealermade.com or call (888) 403-9143 and ask for Jared.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
